subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Washington hired Ed Tapscott, the former Charlotte Bobcats president, as the director of player development. Tapscott, who was briefly the Knicks’ interim general manager, was Charlotte’s president from 2003 to 2006.
snippet: Washington hired Ed Tapscott, the former Charlotte Bobcats president, as the director of player development. Tapscott, who was briefly the Knicks’ interim general manager, was Charlotte’s president from 2003 to 2006.
